content.text:
# Draft:The Sangria War

----
The Sangria War is available on Booksie and Wattpad. The author's pen name is Kimmmikoto. The story begins with a ghost visiting Lolita, who tells her she is a fictional character in her bedroom. Lolita is enraged by the ghost and throws her drink of Sangria at the ghost. Lolita lives in Emberstone Castle with her brother and her father,  James Evergreen, who is the ruler of Intermarium.
References
